SESSION_ID.description: Enter your CypherX session id here; must start with XPLOADER-BOT:~ (Yes, it's like a secret agent code. Don’t mess it up!)

BOT_NAME.description: Enter your bot name here (CypherX is cool, but feel free to name it something quirky!)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter your number here, starting with country code (e.g., 2547xxxxxxxx, because even bots need to know how to reach you!)

OWNER_NAME.description: Enter your name here (Who’s the boss behind the scenes? Spoiler: It's you!)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Enter your Heroku API key here (Like a magic key that grants your bot superpowers on Heroku! Keep it safe, hero!)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the Heroku app name you've just entered above here (The identity of your bot in the Heroku universe!)

TIMEZONE.description: Enter your timezone here. Google it or just leave it if you don't know! (The bot won’t mind, but you should be in sync with time zones!)
